title: Apartments that execute everything in the best quality.
description: This beautifully renovated one-bedroom, one-bathroom condo is in the heart of Old City. This home boasts 11 ft ceilings, exposed brick walls, a beautiful beamed ceiling, and hardwood flooring. The ALL NEW lofty kitchen has a lot of (quartz) countertop space and a huge west-facing window. The kitchen has stainless steel appliances, a subway tile backsplash, and a washer and dryer. All newly redone and very tasteful! The living room is spacious and the high, beamed ceilings really show off the space. Just beyond is the bedroom and full, modern bath. See the photos! New HVAC (2021). Located just a stone’s throw from both I95 and the Ben Franklin Bridge. Only steps away from amazing Philly restaurants like Radicchio, Dinardo’s, Zahav, Morgan's Pier, Tomo Sushi,  Starbucks, and the infamous cold sesame noodles of Han Dynasty!  Have friends visiting? You can walk to all the major tourist attractions like the Liberty Bell, Betsy Ross House, and the National Liberty Museum.

title: 5000 Square Foot Home in Yardley Bucks County
description:
Welcome to this lovely partially furnished 4-bedroom 3½ bath Clearview Estates Colonial. Beautifully landscaped including a front porch provide this home with a vibrant curb appeal in the desirable Pennsbury school district. The interior of the home is spacious, bright, and elegant including an open floor plan and neutral décor. Enter the dramatic two-story foyer with a turned staircase. The living and dining rooms are to the right both with hardwood borders. The kitchen features raised panel 42" cherry cabinetry, double ovens, Corian countertops, a tile back-splash, large center island with a granite top, built-in desk, pantry, and breakfast area overlooking the family room with a wood burning fireplace. There is a private front study with double windows, powder room, laundry room and a 2.5 car side entry garage. Upstairs the primary suite features a vaulted ceiling, sitting area, an abundance of windows, two walk-in closets, an ensuite bath with a soaking tub, double sinks, and large shower. Three additional spacious bedrooms. a large storage room, a hall bath with two vanities with sinks and a back staircase completes the second level. There is a fully finished lower level with an estimated 1100 sq ft, which could easily be used as an in-law suite, providing this home with over 5,000 total sq. ft. of comfortable living space. The finished lower level includes a full bath, a gym, an entertainment area with a full wet bar, a movie/theatre room and additional storage. The backyard features split rail fencing, mature trees adding privacy and a lovely paver patio with perimeter paver walls. Conveniently located to parks, Township pool complex, shopping, recreational facilities and is ideal for commuting via interstate 95/295 or route 1 to either downtown Philly, Trenton/Hamilton train stations, NYC or Jersey. Landlord will cover garbage, sewer, and yard maintenance. Pets on a case by case basis. Contact Nicole Mitchell  show contact info
with questions.

title: Studio apartment with parquet wood floors throughout at The Philadelph
description:
Studio apartment with parquet wood floors throughout at The Philadelphian! This home is located on a high floor and boasts gorgeous city views from a private terrace accessible via the sun-soaked living area. Adjacent, there is an updated, open kitchen showcasing great cabinetry space, a gold light fixture and a breakfast bar. The home also enjoys use of a full hall bathroom with a single vanity and shower/tub, a separate dressing area and excellent storage space throughout. The Philadelphian has often been called a “city within a city” due to its many services and amenities that are offered to residents. From a restaurant to a grocery store, multiple medical offices to a beauty parlor, residents of The Philadelphian will rarely need to travel far to accomplish their daily routine. When the need should arise to leave the premises, the building offers a shuttle bus that runs all day long dropping off and picking up residents throughout Center City. Residents also enjoy a 24 hour doorman, indoor and outdoor pools, and fitness center.

title: GREAT RENTAL OPPORTUNITY LOCATED IN THE FAIRMOUNT NEIGHBORHOOD!
description:
Great rental opportunity. Located in the Fairmount neighborhood of Philadelphia. Many also call it the Art Museum area. This stylish 3 bedroom 2 bath home will surprise you with all the updates, upgrades and sophistication in a home that also offers rare 2 car parking. Parking includes 1 garage spot and 1 driveway spot. Enter through the light filled foyer and into the spacious kitchen and dining room. The living room features a wall of windows with a wood burning fireplace. The living space opens into an oasis for entertaining with the brick paved rear garden/yard. While allowing for privacy is also makes 3 season a entertaining a reality. The 2nd level features 2 very spacious bedrooms with ample closets, and modern renovated hall bath and laundry area. The layout allows for each room occupants personal privacy. The 3rd floor master suite features an oversized bedroom space with it's own balcony/deck. Great view of the holiday fireworks on the parkway. In addition you will find a full walk-in closet that could also offer additional closet space and renovated owners bath. The NEW design in this home has all your bathing and personal needs in 1 beautifully designed space with upgraded flooring, vanity and glass enclosed tiled shower. Other upgrades include the kitchen, the entry way flooring, and refinished hardwood floor throughout, superior appliances including an almost silent disposal, and washer dryer with extra storage stands and washer with 2nd separate washer drawer for small items. The lower level offers significant storage, utilities and access to the garage from inside the home. Some owners have converted the garage into additional living space. The home offers a electric car (EV) charging station in the garage. Located conveniently near both University of Penn and Drexel University, numerous shopping and world class restaurants, 30th Street Station, and world famous Fairmount Park.
2805 Parrish St

title: Elevator building, Beautiful courtyards, New fitness center
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. title: Spacious 3 Bed, 1.5 Bath Home Situated in the Exciting Northern Libert
description:
Welcome to 941 N Randolph Street! This is a spacious 3 bedroom, 1.5 bath home situated in the exciting Northern Liberties section of Philadelphia and is now available for rent. On the entry level you will find a large living room, formal dining room, and an updated/modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances, quartz countertops, a large island, and a wine fridge. The rear of this main level provides a mud room and a convenient, updated, and chic powder room. Moving up one level you will find two spacious bedrooms and a full bath with tub/shower combo. Top-level offers a loft-style bedroom that can be used as a bedroom, an office, bonus room or a workout room. You are sure to enjoy the fenced rear yard which offers privacy and plenty of room for a table and chairs. The basement provides the laundry area as well as additional living and storage space. The property is located on a quiet and serene street that does not see much traffic. Within walking distance you can access Liberty Lands Park & Community Garden, gastro pubs like Standard Tap, and the Piazza - An open air plaza surrounded by unique artisans shops, bottle shops, a record store and boutiques. This area has an exceptional walk score and easy access to public transportation. Your new home is just a few clicks away, inquire now and be settled into this cozy home soon in time to enjoy the holiday season! (Furry friends -- pets will be considered on a case by case basis).

title: RECENTLY RENOVATED 2 BED, 1 BATH CORNER UNIT, WITH 2-CAR PARKING!
description:
Tucked away in Philly's vibrant Queen Village neighborhood, 830 S Howard St #2 is a recently renovated 2 bed, 1 bath corner unit, with 2-car parking, sat on the top level of a duplex. An idyllic courtyard, with gardens and picnic seating, welcomes you at the front of the building. Inside the unit, soaring cathedral ceilings and new luxury flooring frame the bright and airy living room. This space is filled with natural light from 3 windows and a skylight, while a 4th window brightens the separate dining area. The kitchen is fitted with new stainless steel appliances, including a dishwasher, and plenty of cabinet & counter space. There's also room for extra storage or a small table. Down the hall, you'll find a sleek full bathroom adorned with modern fixtures, a glass-enclosed shower, and an updated vanity. Completing the unit are two spacious bedrooms. The primary bedroom has a wet-bar and a pair of sliding doors leading to a Trex deck spanning the unit's width. The building's shared laundry area is on the ground floor, along with an entry from this unit's one garage parking spot and one driveway spot. 830 S Howard's fantastic Queen Village location earns a Walk Score of 93! Nearby South St features markets, restaurants, and cafes, including Whole Foods, ACME, Good Karma, and Bridget Foy's. South of Washington Ave, neighborhood favorites Herman's Coffee, Charlie's Roast Pork, and Pennsport Beer Boutique line E Moyamensing Ave. Shot Tower playground & rec center and Jefferson Sq Park are a few blocks away, plus Target, Acme, Wine & Spirits, Ikea, and Lowes are close by. There's also easy access to public transit, Old City, I-95, and South Jersey via I-76. Schedule your in-person or virtual tour today!
830 S Howard Street Ct #2

title: Tremendous Opportunity to Live at the Cusp of Two Top Neighborhoods
description:
Rittenhouse Square and Graduate Hospital. 1702 Lombard Street offers 4 finished levels of living space and is move-in ready. Step up from the sidewalk and enter into an open front living room featuring hardwood floors, a brick fire place, recessed lighting, and crown moulding. The open first level continues into the kitchen, which showcases granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, and a subway tile backsplash. Just beyond the kitchen are Pella sliding doors that lead out to an oversized red brick patio, the perfect retreat for the city dweller! Back inside, follow the stairwell up to the second floor. This level contains two bedrooms, closet space, and a white tiled bathroom. Steps above, the third floor houses the primary suite which includes a vaulted ceiling, two closets, a wonderfully updated primary bath with marble flooring and pedestal sink, and a bonus linen closet. Before heading on your way, step down to the lower level, which is fully finished and provides a convenient flex space. title: Enjoy luxurious newer construction in Naval Square
description:
Showings start December 1st! Enjoy luxurious newer construction in Naval Square, Center City's premiere gated community in close proximity to South Street Bridge, Fitler Square, Rittenhouse Square, Schuylkill River Park, UPENN, CHOP and HUP. This spacious condo with 2 bedrooms, 2 full baths and 1 dedicated parking space in the heated underground garage is in meticulous condition, has been freshly painted and features an open floor plan with high ceilings, new hardwood floors, large windows with new window treatments, ceiling fans, and recessed lighting throughout. Large living room has Juliet balcony with view of the gorgeous pool, trees and green space. Kitchen features cherry cabinets, pantry, granite counters, stainless appliances, gas range and a raised breakfast bar. Spacious master bedroom offers two closets, tiled shower, granite counters and a large soaking tub. Additional features include spacious second bedroom, second upgraded full bath, washer and dryer, foyer closet and linen closet. Located in the newer Pemberton Manor, a quiet, well maintained building with underground heated parking garage with storage space, this unit is literally next door to the pool, gym and dance/yoga studio with private access exclusively for Pemberton residents... it's like having your own personal fitness center! HVAC maintenance plan, water, sewer, trash and all the amenities are included. No smoking, no pets allowed.

The 2020 bathroom remodel offers a walk-in shower and additional generous storage. The building’s commercial area boasts a grocery store, restaurant/bar, bank, and pharmacy for everyday needs. Or venture out onto the Parkway, Kelly Drive, and the Fairmount neighborhood. This is a no-smoking / no-pet (except for service animals) building.
2401 Pennsylvania Ave #14C48

title: Always save Time and Money..Buy Direct from the banks..over 50% off
description:
If you are in a position today to buy real estate with CASH but can't find large equity deals with clean title anywhere, this post is definitely for you. See the pictures for some recent examples just sold. You always get clean title and great value of theses properties located all over the state of OH in over 40 counties.
Everyday I work with banks/hedge funds that must liquidate residential real estate at many times 50% OR LESS (including all closing costs) on the comparable recognized dollar. So buy direct and save lot of money and time!
Most of these out of state institutions (banks and hedge funds) simply don't want these properties because its not their core business. That's where the opportunity is for you. They just need them GONE quickly.
I am NOT a realtor or wholesaler but instead a property liquidator. Most buyers of these discount properties resale the properties after their desired markup after a clean-out and various cosmetics improvements. About 30% of theses properties are still occupied and you have to do literally nothing except to re-lease them to the occupant and re-market them.
I have several out of state buyers that just hire a clean-out/cosmetic crew (I can recommend some for you) and spend about $1K-$2K to clean-out/freshen -up and re-market them. Many of my buyers have literally never even (or ever will) set foot in the state of OH and they still make nice profits. Many of these properties are from elderly owners who past away.
I will be glad to help you connect with various support services that will help you maximize your results . We also have lenders and realtors that will help you if need be to help resale your assets to qualified buyers after you purchase the properties of your choice.
Simple example: A property that has documented comp value at $80K. You purchase it for just $39.9K (including all closing costs). Or maybe a $100K value home for just $49.9K total costs or LESS. All these assets have meat on the bone (equity) and clean title
NO financing /land contracts/ all cash deals only. All funds professionally handled and closed at local title company. You must register with the fully accredited escrow attorney (no cost) prior to viewing and selecting from ongoing asset list. Properties scattered all over 40+ counties in OH...No Wholesalers please! 100% cash buyers ONLY please
HOW IT WORKS
-register as a buyer (No Cost) just sign a brief NDA (privacy agreement)
-scan the asset list that includes comps/pictures/property notes in an easy to read spreadsheet format
-select (cherry pick) the properties you want most
-deposit funds in secured escrow account with the escrow attorney ..your clean title deed arrives in about 3 weeks
-you make money/equity and select more properties and repeat call or text  show contact info
anytime
